control.name: icbScrollThumbStyle
control.description: Use this combo box to select the editor's thumb style.

control.name: checkEditVertical
control.description: If checked, the editor is verticaly oriented. In this instance, the scroll box moves from bottom to top as the track bar's value increases.

control.name: seSmallChange
control.description: Specifies the small change. This value is added to or subtracted from the Value property when the scroll thumb is moved a small distance.

control.name: seLargeChange
control.description: Specifies the large change. This value is added to or subtracted from the Value property when the scroll thumb is moved a large distance.

control.name: checkEditUseMiddleValue
control.description: Enables a custom middle value (the number of ticks to proceed from the first tick to the middle tick).

control.name: seMiddle
control.description: Specifies a custom middle value (the number of ticks to proceed from the first tick to the middle tick).
